column1: 1. The specific reaction rate of the Ir1/FeOx catalyst during the water gas shift reaction at 300 °C is 43.4 molco gIr−1 h−1.
2. The method combined a typical gold deposition/precipitation method with UV irradiation of the titania support suspended in ethanol.
3. La3+-doping of ceria enhances the water-gas shift reaction by increasing active intermediate concentrations and improving the reactivity of sites responsible for CO2 and H2 formation
column2: thereby facilitating both "redox" and "associative" mechanisms depending on the support's chemical composition.
